Set the extrude depth towards the normal to 0.075 and the extrude depth opposite normal to 0.0. The sketch scale should be set to 0.4875. This will create a cylindrical object with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered middle section. The object has a length of approximately 0.49, a width of 0.075, and a height of approximately 0.49.</description>
